au.edu.griffith.ict

Class CustomerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.griffith.ict.CustomerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manager

    public class CustomerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Manager
    Represents a CustomerManager class, which manages and controls customer loading and saving.

      • get

        public Customer get(java.lang.String phNo)
        Retrieves a customer from the database with the give phone number.
        Parameters:
        phNo - The phone number to search by.
        Returns:
        The customer, or null if it was not found.

      • save

        protected void save()
